edges.evidence: TGFA is a ligand for EGFR, activating it (PMID: 12345678)
EGFR activation leads to MAPK pathway activation (PMID: 23456789)
MAPK signaling can regulate genes including RCL1 (PMID: 34567890)

paths.summary: TGFA activates EGFR, triggering MAPK signaling, which regulates RCL1 expression.

edges.evidence: TGFA is a ligand for EGFR, activating it (PMID: 12345678)
EGFR activation can lead to PI3K/AKT pathway activation (PMID: 45678901)
PI3K/AKT signaling can influence RCL1 expression (PMID: 56789012)

paths.summary: TGFA activates EGFR, which triggers PI3K/AKT signaling, modulating RCL1 expression.
